Docs.summary: Represents a query against a specified table.

TableQuery();

Docs.summary: Represents a query against a specified table.
Docs.remarks: A instance aggregates the query parameters to use when the query is executed. One of the executeQuery or executeQuerySegmented methods of must be called to execute the query. The parameters are encoded and passed to the server when the table query is executed.

Docs.param: A string containing the first formatted filter condition.
A string containing the operator to use (AND, OR).
A string containing the second formatted filter condition.

Docs.returns: A string containing the combined filter expression.

MemberSignature.Value: public static T Project<T> (T entity, params string[] columns);

static member Project : 'T * string[] -> 'T

Docs.typeparam: The entity type of the query.
Docs.param: The entity instance to project off of.
A list of string objects containing the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed.
Docs.summary: Specifies the names of the entity properties to return when the query is executed against the table.
Docs.returns: A instance set with the entity properties to return.
Docs.remarks: The Project clause is optional on a query, used to limit the properties returned from the server. By default, a query will return all properties from the entity.

Docs.param: A list of string objects containing the property names of the table entity properties to return when the query is executed.
Docs.summary: Defines the property names of the table entity properties to return when the table query is executed.
Docs.returns: A instance set with the table entity properties to return.
Docs.remarks: The select clause is optional on a table query, used to limit the table properties returned from the server. By default, a query will return all properties from the table entity.

.method public hidebysig instance class Microsoft.WindowsAzure.Storage.Table.TableQuery Where(string filter) cil managed
Public Function Where (filter As String) As TableQuery

Docs.param: A string containing the filter expression to apply to the table query.
Docs.summary: Defines a filter expression for the table query. Only entities that satisfy the specified filter expression will be returned by the query.
Docs.returns: A instance set with the filter on entities to return.
Docs.remarks: Setting a filter expression is optional; by default, all entities in the table are returned if no filter expression is specified in the table query.
